title: ‘Too scary to stay’: Ukrainians along the front line in Kherson are fleeing as fighting escalates.
dc:creator: Oleksandr Chubko and Carlotta Gall

media:content.media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Civilians who had fled Russian-controlled villages in the Kherson region at a registration point on Sunday.
